The stack frame looks like if the compilation of the expression to evaluate
failed, but the evaluation engine didn't get the notification of the failure and
tried to continue the process. As the compilation was not complete, some data
were not computed and returned null instead of a value.
Need to be able to reproduce the problem to solve it.
This happened again with M7. Still no steps to reproduce. Just for the records...

Rafael: I fixed bug 51425 last friday, the stack trace generated looks close to
the one you reported.
Were you in the state of bug 51425 ? i.e. a project has jar in its build path
which references classes from an other jar not in the build path.

Sorry, Luc, I have no idea at what moment it happened nor which code I was
debugging.
